featured_reviews.review_id: The place was dirty and the service was slow. They also forgot some of my food items 5 dipping sauces and mozzarella sticks. This is not a good burger king location. Metrotown and Granville are way better locations.
featured_reviews.review_text: The place was dirty and the service was slow. They also forgot some of my food items 5 dipping sauces and mozzarella sticks. This is not a good burger king location. Metrotown and Granville are way better locations.

featured_reviews.review_id: only 2 people working and it was busy afternoon. The cashier  is handling money with ripped gloves and at the same time he is touching food with same gloves.He didnt change gloves and he served 6 customers. The place is dirty.
featured_reviews.review_text: only 2 people working and it was busy afternoon. The cashier  is handling money with ripped gloves and at the same time he is touching food with same gloves.He didnt change gloves and he served 6 customers. The place is dirty.

featured_reviews.review_id: Food is fine, but they are regularly SLOW at this location and often leave the customer at the front of the line unacknowledged. Took 16+ minutes for my mobile order of 1 large fries and 10 nuggets. They gave me 8 nuggets and asked me to wait 3 more minutes for the other 2 after I pointed out what my order was.

featured_reviews.review_id: It's like every other standard BURGER KING but something about the huge eating area just felt cold (not in the physical sence) can not exactly explain. The food was really good. Service was good. But this was my experience.
featured_reviews.review_text: It's like every other standard BURGER KING but something about the huge eating area just felt cold (not in the physical sence) can not exactly explain. The food was really good. Service was good. But this was my experience.

featured_reviews.review_id: I was given the silent treatment while ordering, which is fine, but the girl at the counter decided to give my $4.50 in change back to me in all quarters - she went out of her way to do this, took 2 full minutes, to silently open up a new roll of coins & dump them into my hand while glaring at me. i understand being miserable at your job, but this felt venomous & intentional for no reason - i'm literally just trying to get a sandwich and leave lol. there was no rush, i said hello, please & thank you.  i have no clue what i could have done to offend her.

featured_reviews.review_id: I ordered food today at 11:35 am the staff was rude bcz when i ordered fresh veggie sandwich and she served old one and when i go back and told that its not fresh she talk in a very bad manner and said its fresh now we can't do anything. (25-oct-2023)

places.address: Burger King, 821 Granville St, Vancouver, BC V6Z 1K9

featured_reviews.review_id: We went there after the bars let out. The food quality was as expected but the restaurant was dirty and had two sleeping people passed out within view of the staff. At one point I thought one of the guys was dead and the staff said they will look into it. Luckily the guy was okay.
featured_reviews.review_text: We went there after the bars let out. The food quality was as expected but the restaurant was dirty and had two sleeping people passed out within view of the staff. At one point I thought one of the guys was dead and the staff said they will look into it. Luckily the guy was okay.

featured_reviews.review_id:
I can't believe I haven't reviewed this Burger King yet. This place is legendary. If you're a super posh person who can't handle the real world, this Burger King isn't for you. That said, all kinds of people frequent this Burger King. Of course there are individuals, I know someone who got ripped off by an individual in this Burger King. There are also regular working people, office people, young people, and tourists. Usually they always have posters up for items that sold out long ago. They have a really large menu with a lot of customizability. I always found the staff to be nice and patient with me, even though I have yet to memorize the Burger King menu, and always need to read it when I get to the front. When you're standing at the front waiting for your food, it feels really tense, like a contest, because some things take forever, and you could get your food way earlier or way later than you expect.

Not just anybody can use the bathrooms, they would be too prone to abuse in a location like this, the bathrooms are for paying customers only. No shenanigans.

I like the music they play in here, it's always pleasant. Generally '70s music with a leaning towards soul.

The Angry Whopper is dope, I like that, I get it with no cheese because I'm lactose intolerant. I want to try and see if they have any spicy chicken tenders or nuggets.

This is a lively and fun establishment.

To be honest, I like to go to Jollibee first and order a two piece chicken, eat that, and then smuggle the Jollibee gravy in my pocket and use it for the Burger King fries. I haven't gotten banned yet.

I usually go during off hours in the afternoons, and there are a lot of individuals. Right now I'm here at lunch and it is very orderly and normal. Kind of disappointing, really.

I usually go during off hours in the afternoons, and there are a lot of individuals. Right now I'm here at lunch and it is very orderly and normal. Kind of disappointing, really.

featured_reviews.review_id:
I usually don't leave 1 star reviews unless it's really bad, but this place warrants it. I made a mobile order and went for pick up about 10 minutes later. The staff asked for my order number which I provided. They told me to wait a bit more since it was still being made. I waited for around 20 minutes right in front of the pick up window so they were aware I was there the entire time. When the order numbers being called were way ahead of mine, I asked if my order was ready yet since it looked like they'd forgotten about mine. Guess what, it was sitting in the back ready for god knows how long.

The staff really don't care about their customers and it's also quite obvious that their processes are extremely inefficient from watching them for 20 minutes. Avoid this BK unless necessary.

featured_reviews.review_id: Whopper is always delicious and big enough to fill your stomach. Chicken poppers are ok but the chicken is not high quality. Service is efficient and quick but I took off a star because they replaced my dipping sauce with another one without telling me because they were out of the one I ordered. I would have appreciated that they asked me with which one to replace. Also I took off another star for the size of the fries that is ridiculously small. Seriously bk, even the small size of McDo is bigger than your medium size!!

featured_reviews.review_id: A place with a bathroom to use which is very rare in Vancouver. Good food and service but didn't pay attention to my special order burger.  Ordered a whopper junior with onion rings and a whopper with no lettuce, extra pickle, extra onions. Just got a regular whopper with normal fixings.Otherwise coulda got the five stars.

featured_reviews.review_id:
If you go to buy something there, double check your food, as customer I trust in the quality of the food provided by this kind of restaurant, I never expect when I open my food for enjoy it find this surprise, actually this is pretty dangerous for me or anybody who eat this, I could be poisoned by this sandwich.

One recommendation also for people who is working there,care your customers and their health, I am really upset to find this, because is pretty obvious that the mold in the pan means that pan is old, how many items did you put in the food of your customers that already were bad and also, because when I went to buy there you weren't busy so you must to check the quality of everything always, even if you are busy you should be ashamed for give that food to your customers.

So disappointed and upset with you #BurguerKing team .

featured_reviews.review_id:
Visited location on Sunday, September 24, 2023, at 9:50 PM.

Placed order at restaurant and told that the dining room is CLOSED, despite signs showing location closes at 11 PM.

Girl was cleaning and stated that they needed to close one hour early due to cleaning. This would be 70 minutes before the restaurant closes.  Is cleaning while you go, not a concept used here?

As long as any restaurant is open, their dining area is also open, but not here.  24-hour restaurants in the states are open the full 24 hours and don't close for cleaning.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Got FOOD POISONING here a month back. I went in, not to complain, but to inform them. They flat out told me I was wrong.

I had ONLY eaten there the day before, so it HAD to be them. They denied it and told me it was my own fault. Made me feel so bad. I wasn't even mad. I just wanted to give them a heads up.

featured_reviews.review_id:
In the dimly lit corner of a forgotten strip mall, there stands a tragically neglected Burger King. The exterior, once vibrant and inviting, is now marred by cracked, peeling paint and a faded, dilapidated sign. Graffiti decorates the windows, concealing the desolation within. The drive-thru intercom, encrusted with grime, emits an eerie hum, as if it's whispering tales of abandonment.

Stepping inside, the atmosphere is oppressive with a nauseating odor that combines the stench of rancid cooking oil, moldy carpets, and the faint scent of decay. The tiles on the floor, cracked and stained, crunch beneath your feet as if protesting the indignity they've suffered. Dim, flickering fluorescent lights cast eerie shadows across cracked plastic booths and wobbly, sticky tables. The once-vibrant red and yellow decor has faded into a murky palette of despair.

Behind the counter, the staff's apathy is palpable. They move in slow motion, their uniforms tattered and stained. The kitchen is a horror show of neglect, with greasy surfaces and grimy fryers that haven't seen a cleaning in ages. Forgotten food remnants fester in the corners, and a colony of flies buzzes lazily around discarded wrappers.

As for the food, the offerings are a grim reminder of the restaurant's decline. Soggy, overcooked burgers and limp, wilted lettuce are served on stale buns, drowning in a sea of congealed cheese and tepid condiments. The fries are a sad heap of cold, withered potato sticks that crumble upon touch.

This decrepit, neglected Burger King should be shut down not only for its wretched appearance and unsanitary conditions but also for the risk it poses to public health. It's a disheartening testament to the importance of maintaining cleanliness and quality in the foodservice industry, and its continued operation is a disservice to both its employees and customers.

featured_reviews.review_id: Such a bad place ! Only one person works here doing all the job: cleaning, cooking and taking orders (I don't know, maybe it was a weekend day , but in my opinion this is just a slavery). Very dirty inside  (again, the person does not have time to do everything himself). We came there with a big family, ordered Poutine, Meal, Burger, Chicken nuggets, French Fries, Chicken rap and drinks. But in the end, instead of Poutine, they gave French Fries, instead of Meal, they gave one burger. The girl who served us was not friendly and looked very tired. Even for a Fast Food - this is a very bad place!

featured_reviews.review_id: "I recently visited the Burger King store located at Denman Place Mall and had an unexpected experience with their mobile ordering system. Despite using the Burger King app and paying for my order in advance, my meal was not prepared until I arrived at the restaurant and showed the staff my order confirmation number. The manager explained that this policy is in place to prevent food from getting cold, but as a customer, I believe it should be my decision whether or not I want my order prepared early. This resulted in a longer wait time for my food, which was disappointing given the convenience of using the app. Perhaps there could be an option for customers to choose whether they want their order prepared immediately or upon arrival?"
featured_reviews.review_text: "I recently visited the Burger King store located at Denman Place Mall and had an unexpected experience with their mobile ordering system. The manager explained that this policy is in place to prevent food from getting cold, but as a customer, I believe it should be my decision whether or not I want my order prepared early. This resulted in a longer wait time for my food, which was disappointing given the convenience of using the app. Perhaps there could be an option for customers to choose whether they want their order prepared immediately or upon arrival?"

featured_reviews.review_id:
Came here for some quick food -- ordered two full meals and asked to use the washroom. I was told there was no public washrooms -- after waiting for my food and sitting down to eat, they proceeded to allow the next customer coming in to use the washroom.

I understand it can be difficult in locations to maintain a washroom -- but I'm not sure why some customers can use the washroom and others cannot?

places.address: Burger King, 8575 Sea Island Wy, Richmond, BC V6X 0A8

featured_reviews.review_id: Bought multiple take outs from this Burger King and the food has been consistently alright. Don't hate it and don't love it. Haven't had a OMG moment with a burger yet at this location. Recently got lured to go because of their $2 iced oreo coffee and their $1 fries. The iced Coffee had no oreo taste but at least it tasted like coffee right? Fries were fresh and crispy but under seasoned. Asked for more packs of ketchup but I guess he underestimated my ketchup usage for those bland tasting fries. I still have a good 55% of fries left after my packets of ketchup was done.

featured_reviews.review_id:
((TL;DR   bad burger, never finished. Made me pukey for 3 hours.))

I haven't had Burger King in nearly a decade, the last Burger King I went to was when I lived in North Vancouver.  I live in Richmond now, I chose this Burger King on a whim for fun. "a Whopper, why not?" I had the burger at 1:45 in the afternoon, by 1:57 p.m. I was shaking and dry heaving the next 3 hours onward. The burger was barely hot I would even go to say it was room temperature the fries were barely warm as well I ate it there it's not like I walked outside the same thing happens at the Granville location,and the marine drive location, assuming it's still in business. This isn't a freak incident why does Burger King not serve hot food? Why does Burger King serve tepid bad food?

The server was nice.
The service was fine.
The atmosphere inside kind of empty but good music playing on.
It looks nice in there.
why is the food quality so poor?
why is the food not hot?
serve your burgers hot.
I expected better, '97-05 level better.

Ordered from this store 2 nights in a row and received wrong items on both occasions.

Missing 2 piece nuggets and got wrap instead of whopper burger.

Really poor customer service. Have to wait out at the drive through counter for them to give me the correct order.

featured_reviews.review_id: Disappointed. Came to get two meals. One Double Roasted Garlic King sandwich, medium fries, coke, and Crispy chicken sandwich, large onion rings with coke, and popcorn. Spent $40 for all that. Price isn't what I'm complaining about, although they could make it not $40 for two meals. Anyway, while the crispy chicken and onion rings were really good we were extremely disappointed to see the boring and plain looking double roasted garlic king. No onions. No roasted garlic. Just two beef stacked and cheese at the very top. It made us feel nauseous after finishing it. It was not at all what the pictures on their website/menu showed. The fries and chicken popcorn were dry and didn't taste good at all. Burger King is always a hit or miss.

featured_reviews.review_id: Tried the new Impossible Whoppers (2 for a family member and I), absolutely excellent experience. Reasonably quick wait time from order to prep and staff were friendly in the drive through. The food was hot, fries were clearly fresh and crispy, drinks were carbonated and cold. The burger itself was amazing! I've had some terrible fast food experiences in the past and this was a shockingly good one. Keep it up folks! Thank you. I was there today Sat, May 8th @ approximately 1:10 PM.

What's going on burger King head office?

What's going on burger King head office?

featured_reviews.review_id:
Filthy restaurant. Every single table and chair has crumbs or stains.

All the chairs are pushed in,  so their employees neglect to clean any of them.

They don't give you a receipt,  they only call out numbers. Who the hell knows what order is theirs.

I wanted to dine in. No one asked, so they gave me a bag instead of a tray. Without a tray I'm unable to clear off my table. Maybe that will force them to actually clean up the restaurant eating area. We'll see how long it takes them.

Should have read the reviews before coming to this establishment. When there are more 1 star reviews than any others, you know immediately that there is a serious problem with the entire staff.

The most eye-opening review was how they were shut down by the public health regulator body due to filth.

There are MANY other restaurants in the same parking lot. I should have gone to any of them instead. I suggest you do.

featured_reviews.review_id: This is my favorite BK. Staff are friendly, helpful and doing their best to keep area and tables clean. Dining is large enough with plenty sitting tables and stools. Free parking lot in front. Food quality is good and free refill for drinks available. BK has always good offers if install the App or use coupons. Save your time and money  with order ahead by mobile app is the best choice.
featured_reviews.review_text: This is my favorite BK. Staff are friendly, helpful and doing their best to keep area and tables clean. Dining is large enough with plenty sitting tables and stools. Free parking lot in front. Food quality is good and free refill for drinks available. BK has always good offers if install the App or use coupons. Save your time and money  with order ahead by mobile app is the best choice.

featured_reviews.review_id: So I came to burger King, got some nice whoppers, decided to get some NASTY SMORES drink, the lady was nice to change it for something else. Although I had some backup, from a stranger who got the same order of that Coffee Smores drink, and freaking did a U-Turn with the drinks and he helped me to make the lady change her mind to give us   some ketchup nuggets instead and pay the $1 dollar difference. The ketchup nuggets are actually pretty good, although my boyfriend didn't like them. But warning THOSE SMORES DRINKS  are awful they taste like e-juice.

featured_reviews.review_id: The phillipinee girl working at this location is very rude.. I don't understand what kind of attitude she carries.. raising eyebrows and showing attitude while taking order. Relax girl, you're not giving anything for free. We pay for the things we order.   poor service!

featured_reviews.review_id:
Located in an open mall, place itself is very well maintained, floor is clean and clutter free.
Tables are clean and looked after, when customers leave.
But the sandwiches were very soggy and soft.
The fries and onion rings were good and fresh, and no burnt oil smell.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Clean and neat!
Nice location in North Vancouver!
The quality of the service is not good!
The person that served me was not professional, there was no smile, no greetings, no even asking about what I want to add up to my meal for example (cheese with burger or not) and very un welcoming to the customers.
I understand the bad situation that people might go through but me as a customer always expect to be treated well.
Food quality was not the best!
I asked for to go order and the fries too dry and cold:(
--------------------------------
Update
I went many times later, every time I go the service was good and everything was good so I had to update the eating from 2 to 4.

places.name: Burger King
places.description: Well-known fast-food chain serving grilled burgers, fries & shakes.
places.address: Burger King, 4700 Kingsway Unit 1200e, Burnaby, BC V5H 4M1

featured_reviews.review_id: All the employees are excellent, the service was amazing despite the busy hours. Polite, with a smile on their face, great attitude, and even better customer service. Hope to see the team again. Made my day wonderful
featured_reviews.review_text: All the employees are excellent, the service was amazing despite the busy hours. Polite, with a smile on their face, great attitude, and even better customer service. Hope to see the team again. Made my day wonderful

featured_reviews.review_id:
For the first time in a long time, I had a guy on cash that was really good. He was polite and quick and helpful.

Disappointed with the restaurant however, the restaurant is in the food court and open till 9 pm. I was trying to order on the BK app for pick up at around 815 pm and the app said that you cannot order from this store, it's closed. I walked up into the food court and the store was open.

It's ridiculous that they shut down the online ordering portal hours before the store shuts down. Wasted 5 mins of my time waiting around for the order when I could have just ordered online. This isn't the first time this is happening, and it would be great if Bk management put a stop to this and allow people to order upto at least 845-855 pm on the app.

featured_reviews.review_id: I went there and asked to order a crispy butter chicken they laughed and said we removed it.( i dont know if its possible or no) and i asked what chicken do you have they just gave me a sanwich which i dont want.And they gave me no sauce i asked can i have barbeque sauce he was like let me think about it for more than 60 second and gave me mustard. Overall their customer service was zero to none and their behavior is bad. The worst experience and im not happy with my food.I will never ever order anything from burger king again.

featured_reviews.review_id: Waited for 10min after placing my order at the counter before finally someone decided to check on the status. At least the 20 people ordering after me had their lunch. All he heard was "Sorry" after asking why it was so long.

featured_reviews.review_id: I don't know why I have diarrhea and vomiting after eating in this store. I don't know if I'm allergic to the beef I've been eating for over a decade or if there's a real hygiene issue.

featured_reviews.review_id: So what I witnessed today while waiting for my order that the person did not wash their hands after touching the garbage. Like isn't this something important and here you guys are violating the health and safety rule. No doubt your food is good but it still does not matter if you are not even washing your hands, not putting gloves is other matter. It's so basic and that person while they have cheese stack in one hand and the with the other pushing the garbage and then use the same hand for doing cheese. Isn't it violation, correct me if I am wrong.

featured_reviews.review_id: This BK has decent numbers of sitting and tables for different group sizes. There is patio area as well. Food and cleaning was good. Staff should be more frindly. Location is at the corner of Kingsway and Hall then roadside parking are metered unless you park in the behind streets for 30 min or 2 hours free spots.

featured_reviews.review_id: The restaurant is always kept clean. The team members have a welcoming smile and are very humble. Their menu range is very vast and u get a lot to chose from. Definitely give it a try...
featured_reviews.review_text: The restaurant is always kept clean. The team members have a welcoming smile and are very humble. Their menu range is very vast and u get a lot to chose from. Definitely give it a try...

featured_reviews.review_id:
I was in this store on Sept. 13/23 and had awful service. I did the online survey and asked to be contacted and have never gotten any response. This is not the first time this has happened. I ordered a whopper junior with no onions. When I opened and took a bite of the sandwich it had onions in it. I had to spit it out. If I eat raw onions I get hives.  When I took it back to the counter, the woman who served me basically said it was my fault because I was talking to my friend when I was ordering.  Im not an idiot, I always ask for no onions.
I told her that I was not talking to my friend and I specifically said no onions. She then backed off and made me a new burger. Afterwards I saw her whispering to her co-worker.  This is not the first time this has happened and I did the survey before and never got a response.  I will never go back to burger king again and I make sure to tell everyone of the bad service from the restaurant and the head office.
Obviously neither care about customer service, Mcdonalds  is located directly across the street and I will just go there.

featured_reviews.review_id:
TAKE A LOOK WHAT THEY MADE!!!!!

The patty of this burger should be thrown away as garbage, neither the person who made the patty nor the person who made the burger is not a human being. Their attitude towards customers can be seen from the food they make, and their shift manager's attitude towards customers is a testament to this. From the beginning to the end, it seems that I was the one who deliberately caused trouble, and they seemed to see through my inner thoughts. The manager on duty did not apologize, whether it was verbal or in the heart, and the person who makes the burger is always evading that she didn't fry the patties... Check out the other bad reviews, let's unite against this black shop!

featured_reviews.review_id:
33 MINUTES!
Would you want to wait over half an hour for two combos after placing an online mobile order for take out?

A pizza would be free after that long and they still have to deliver it. If we'd gotten McDonald's across the street, I would've been home and eating by the time this order was ready. Me & Ed's down the street would've had our food ready and they are a sit down restaurant with table service.

The worst part though was how it was handled, and why I won't be coming back.  The lack of communication from the staff, avoidance of the issue to just straight lying to my face about it and ignoring me after requesting a refund was the last straw.

Avoid this location.

featured_reviews.review_id: Good and fresh food. Staff is nice and friendly. Had crispy chicken combo which was quite good. Overall nice experience, will return soon.
featured_reviews.review_text: Good and fresh food. Staff is nice and friendly. Had crispy chicken combo which was quite good. Overall nice experience, will return soon.

featured_reviews.review_id: Worst veggie burger everrrrr. The oil was all sticking in my upper pallet to which when I complained, the staff said that it is the usual taste (which is not the exact case as I have eaten earlier too). Seems like they fed us stale patty. Not at all expected from a brand like such.

featured_reviews.review_id: Good clean restaurant with friendly staff. They're not trained in good customer service.  I asked if the lady serving my fries could give me half onion rings, half fries.  One word answer: NO !  The wooden fork is a pain in the butt because it doesn't pick up food.  The recycled paper straw is terrible.  There are recyclable plastic straws.

places.address: Burger King, 4720 Mcclelland Rd #1805, Richmond, BC V6X 0M6

featured_reviews.review_id: I came to Walmart for groceries and got hungry, so I ordered a crispy chicken burger at burgerking here. However, while eating, I found the chicken too dark, dry, and hard, eating it impossible to continue. I feel like I'm the only customer, and it seems like the chicken was fried a long time ago. Hoping for improvement, I'm leaving this note.
featured_reviews.review_text: I came to Walmart for groceries and got hungry, so I ordered a crispy chicken burger at burgerking here. However, while eating, I found the chicken too dark, dry, and hard, eating it impossible to continue. I feel like I'm the only customer, and it seems like the chicken was fried a long time ago. Hoping for improvement, I'm leaving this note.

featured_reviews.review_id:
After what seemed an intentional 9 minute wait for my burger and cheezy bites (only 2 other people were in the restaurant and none had orders pending when I placed my order), I was appalled to find a huge lump in my burger (it was a large lettuce core that would be unimaginably an oversight). My food was ordered eat in, but served in a To-Go bag with no tray.
Perhaps they didn't approve of my choice of value options, and meant to discourage me from doing so in the future?
Very disappointed. I feel targeted, and will not be returning for food, here.

featured_reviews.review_id: I had a Whopper and a fish burger. Both were extremely well done but I mean as they were very good. Both sandwiches were distinct and fresh.
featured_reviews.review_text: I had a Whopper and a fish burger. Both were extremely well done but I mean as they were very good. Both sandwiches were distinct and fresh.

featured_reviews.review_id: The employees here do not make any effort to keep the place clean, despite it being a relatively new establishment. When we went there at around 3pm, there were barely any customers but literally every single table was dirty with food crumbs and grease. Used napkins on the floor, men's room absolutely filthy. When one of the workers actually began wiping down tables, she only pushed the food crumbs onto the floor and then simply walked away. But from my angle I could still clearly see the crumbs and grease on those tables.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Polite and friendly people. New and clean restaurant.
Foods are not relay amazing and not sure why.
Usually whopper burgers are thick and juicy, but this one which we tried was very dry, and like cheap frozen ones.
Onion rings and Fries were fresh and tasty.
featured_reviews.review_text:
Polite and friendly people. New and clean restaurant.
Foods are not relay amazing and not sure why.
Usually whopper burgers are thick and juicy, but this one which we tried was very dry, and like cheap frozen ones.
Onion rings and Fries were fresh and tasty.

featured_reviews.review_id: Everyone makes mistakes and I could forgive that. But how the mistake is addressed speaks loudly about the business. We ordered for dine-in their heavily advertized Jalapeno Cheesy Bites and bit into dried cheese on the inside. We showed it to the manager who began to stonewall us, by telling us that's how they should be, despite a large picture in the lobby and on the menu board showing molten centres. After some haggling, she did **very unhappily** replace the order. This time, they came out perfect. But I did not appreciate her attitude, her long face, plus no apologies. I would have given five stars if she had simply smiled and said, "Sorry, let's get you some fresh ones."

featured_reviews.review_id: Honestly the food was ok, but I'm giving 2 stars mostly because of how rude and unprofessional the workers were. I was in the front to get my order taken, but had to wait because the two workers infront were to busy talking with each other. I made full eye contact with both of them and smiled but they just turned their heads back and continued talking and laughing and I know it wasn't an important conversation too because they were both smiling and leaning on the counter. When one of them finally approached my order, she was giving me attitude as if I was the rude one who interrupted their conversation.
